snippet: Bond prices and currency markets were upended by a European Central Bank plan that was less aggressive than expected.
abstract: Stocks fall sharply as European markets drop after European Central Bank announces stimulus plans that were not as strong as investors expected.
lead_paragraph: Bond prices and currency markets were upended by a European Central Bank plan that was less aggressive than expected.

headline.main: Wall St. Is Down, With Stimulus the Focus
headline.print_headline: European Markets Sink, Dragging U.S. With Them
